quotes.quote: I wish I could shut up, but I can't, and I won't.
If you have something to say then you want someone to pay attention or at least to have the opportunity for them to tell you to shut up and go away.
I feel that if a person has problems communicating the very least he can do is to shut up.
If you shut up truth, and bury it underground, it will but grow.
I'm trying to shut up and let my angels speak to me and tell me what I'm supposed to do.
We need to stop telling each other to shut up. We need to get comfortable with the reality that no one is going to shut up.
There is a time to speak and a time to listen, and sometimes people need to shut up.
I shut up and keep my ears and eyes open.
My best advice to you: Shut up.
If you can't keep quiet, shut up!
Indeed, at times it's best to shut up.
I learned that you actually have more power when you shut up.
You're playing or you're not playing. If you're playing, so just shut up and play.
Shut up. Just shut up. You had me at 'hello'.
Much talking is the cause of danger. Silence is the means of avoiding misfortune. The talkative parrot is shut up in a cage. Other birds, without speech, fly freely about.
Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
If you don't shut up, how can I answer your questions!
Shut up and say something.
Shut up, if you talking 'bout me I'm talking to you
Shut up and sleep with me come on, why don't you sleep with me?
Never miss a good chance to shut up.
If you can't do, you'd best shut up about it.
Whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
If you have any problems at all, don't hesitate to shut up.
If you shut up truth, and bury it underground, it will but grow.
It's very important in life to know when to shut up. You should not be afraid of silence.
Before you can make good music, you just have to shut up. Then the music can say what it has to say.
Smart is knowing if you're dumb. Knowing when to shut up and to listen to people that are smarter than you.
Do not shut up the young people against their will in a pew, and force the children to ask them questions for an hour against their will.

Shut up and do not think. All the theorists agree: shut up and keep the words from being said. And all of the scars will remain invisible; and all of the scars will remain under the skin. Where they belong.
